colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUN GYIS RJES GNANG BYA TSUL GYI CHO GA THUN MONG MA YIN PA MI 'JIGS DPA' MO'I ZHAL LUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI YONGS KYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DAM PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA DANG DU BLANGS TE, RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA'I DGONGS DON GZHIR BZHAG PA LA, PHYAG LEN GYI RIM PA SHIN TU GSAL ZHING LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR, ,RIG SNGAGS 'CHANG PA'I BTZUN PA, ^ DAM TSIG RDO RJES SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MAS RNAMS KUN RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
